string-array.name: question_array
string-array.item: You would rather spend time with a small group of friends than at a crowded event
You would describe yourself as open minded
You sometimes find it more difficult than others to understand emotion
You would describe yourself as an organized person
You feel like a natural in social situations
You tend to focus on the now rather than what could be
You like to follow your heart
You find it hard to focus on the same thing for long periods of time
You like to have a lot of alone time
You tend to search for deeper or hidden meaning in art
You are always in control of your emotions
You always like to plan ahead
You find it easy to make small talk with strangers
You see yourself as a mostly pragmatic and practical person
You are often feel strong emotions watching movies or while reading books
You are flexible and can easily deal with unexpected challenges
You have a small group of friends
You like to interpret your own meanings from books or movies
You believe logic and reason are the most important aspects of decision making
You like to have a backup plan in case of any unforeseen events
You do not mind being the center of attention
You like it when an artistic piece has a clear theme rather than a more abstract one
You typically consider the emotions of others
You will often switch between different projects as you work
You prefer to work alone instead of in a group
You like to entertain abstract theories about what the future may bring
You feel that most if not all problems are best solved in a rational, logical way
You like to make lists of tasks to be completed and accomplish them one at a time
You feel energized in a large group of people
You do not like to spend time on ideas that could be considered intangible or far fetched
Your mood can change very quickly
You have many varied passions that are constantly evolving and changing
You are known to be quiet or reserved
You have a tendency to get lost in your own imagination
You feel people should spend more time on rationality as opposed to their emotions
You prefer to complete all of your work before taking time to relax
You have a large group of friends
You find simplicity more attractive than complexity
You find it easy to discern how someone else may be feeling
You seem to often struggle with meeting work deadlines
